author: desruisseaux
msg: Update the RAT plugin, and filter the amount of reports produced by Maven.
We omit reports on the plugins used for the build, which are considered build implementation details.

author: minfrin
msg: * easy proposals to synch 2.4.x and trunk
- Use apr_pstrmemdup instead of apr_pstrndup when this is safe.
- Use apr_pstrmemdup instead of apr_pstrndup when this is safe.
- 'ap_getword_conf' does not return NULL but an empty string
- Ease logic around 'ap_getword_conf' and drop useless line of code.
- Remove redundant check (already performed the line before)
